SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.SUDO_EXECUTION
:set &mode# = "--install" :if &UC4RB_RPM_UPGRADE# = "YES" : set &mode# = "--upgrade" :endif
:if &UC4RB_RPM_INSTALL_PREFIX# <> "" : set &prefix# = str_cat('--prefix "', &UC4RB_RPM_INSTALL_PREFIX#) : set &prefix# = str_cat(&prefix#, '"') :endif
:if &UC4RB_RPM_INSTALL_RELOCATE# <> "" : set &relocate# = "" : set &rest# = &UC4RB_RPM_INSTALL_RELOCATE# : set &pos# = str_find(&rest#, ",") : while &pos# > 0 : set &end# = sub(&pos#, 1) : set &part# = substr(&rest#, 1, &end#) : set &relocate# = str_cat(&relocate#, " --relocate") : set &relocate# = str_cat(&relocate#, &part#) : set &start# = add(&pos#, 1) : set &rest# = substr(&rest#, &start#) : set &pos# = str_find(&rest#, ",") : endwhile :endif
:set &allfiles# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_ALL_FILES# = "YES" : set &allfiles# = "--allfiles" :endif
:set &excludepath# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_EXCLUDE_PATH# <> "" : set &excludepath# = str_cat('--excludepath "', &UC4RB_RPM_EXCLUDE_PATH#) : set &excludepath# = str_cat(&excludepath#, '"') :endif
:set &excludedocs# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_EXCLUDE_DOCS# = "YES" : set &excludedocs# = "--excludedocs" :endif
:set &replacefiles# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_REPLACE_FILES# = "YES" : set &replacefiles# = "--replacefiles" :endif
:set &replacepkgs# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_REPLACE_PACKAGES# = "YES" : set &replacepkgs# = "--replacepkgs" :endif
:set &oldpackage# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_REPLACE_OLD_PACKAGES# = "YES" : set &oldpackage# = "--oldpackage" :endif
:set &ignoresize# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_IGNORE_SPACE_CHECK# = "YES" : set &ignoresize# = "--ignoresize" :endif
:set &ignorearch# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_IGNORE_ARCH_CHECK# = "YES" : set &ignorearch# = "--ignorearch" :endif
:set &ignoreos# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_IGNORE_OS_TYPE_CHECK# = "YES" : set &ignoreos# = "--ignoreos" :endif
:set &justdb# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_ONLY_DB_UPDATE# = "YES" : set &justdb# = "--justdb" :endif
:set &nodigest# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_IGNORE_DIGEST# = "YES" : set &nodigest# = "--nodigest" :endif
:set &nomanifest# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_IGNORE_MANIFEST# = "YES" : set &nomanifest# = "--nomanifest" :endif
:set &nosignature# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_IGNORE_HDR_SIGN# = "YES" : set &nosignature# = "--nosignature" :endif
:set &nodeps# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_IGNORE_DEP_CHECK# = "YES" : set &nodeps# = "--nodeps" :endif
:set &noorder# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_DONT_REORDER# = "YES" : set &noorder# = "--noorder" :endif
:set &noscripts# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_NO_SCRIPTS# = "YES" : set &noscripts# = "--noscripts" :endif
:set &nopre# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_NO_PRE_SCRIPT# = "YES" : set &nopre# = "--nopre" :endif
:set &nopost# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_NO_POST_SCRIPT# = "YES" : set &nopost# = "--nopost" :endif
:set &nopreun# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_NO_PREUN_SCRIPT# = "YES" : set &nopreun# = "--nopreun" :endif
:set &nopostun# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_NO_POSTUN_SCRIPT# = "YES" : set &nopostun# = "--nopostun" :endif
:set &notriggers# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_NO_TRIGGERS# = "YES" : set &notriggers# = "--notriggers" :endif
:set &notriggerin# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_NO_TRIGGER_IN# = "YES" : set &notriggerin# = "--notriggerin" :endif
:set &notriggerun# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_NO_TRIGGER_UN# = "YES" : set &notriggerun# = "--notriggerun" :endif
:set &notriggerpostun# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_NO_TRIGGER_POSTUN# = "YES" : set &notriggerpostun# = "--notriggerpostun" :endif
:set &test# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_TEST_ONLY# = "YES" : set &test# = "--test" :endif
:set &host# = "" !Reorder concat process, we have to concat host+port first, then "/" symbol <---start :if &UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_PORT# <> 0 : set &host# = str_cat(&host#, ":") : set &host# = str_cat(&host#, &UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_PORT#) :endif
:if &UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_HOST# <> "" : set &host# = str_cat(&UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_HOST#, "/") :endif !Reorder concat process, we have to concat host+port first, then "/" symbol --->end :set &user# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_FTP_USER# <> "" : set &user# = &UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_FTP_USER# : if &UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_FTP_PWD# <> "" !Add password special symbol handling <---start :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_FTP_PWD# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_URI@UNIX :SET &UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_FTP_PWD# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# !Add password special symbol handling --->end : set &user# = str_cat(&user#, ":") : set &user# = str_cat(&user#, &UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_FTP_PWD#) : endif : set &user# = str_cat(&user#, "@") :endif
:set &ftpproxy# = "" :set &ftpport# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_FTP_PROXY_HOST# <> "" : set &ftpproxy# = str_cat("--ftpproxy ", &UC4RB_RPM_FTP_PROXY_HOST#) : set &ftpport# = str_cat("--ftpport ", &UC4RB_RPM_FTP_PROXY_PORT#) :endif
:set &httpproxy# = "" :set &httpport# = "" :if &UC4RB_RPM_HTTP_PROXY_HOST# <> "" : set &httpproxy# = str_cat("--httpproxy ", &UC4RB_RPM_HTTP_PROXY_HOST#) : set &httpport# = str_cat("--httpport ", &UC4RB_RPM_HTTP_PROXY_PORT#) :endif
:if &UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_VIA_FTP# = "YES" : set &url# = str_cat("ftp://", &user#) : set &url# = str_cat(&url#, &host#) : set &url# = str_cat(&url#, &UC4RB_RPM_FILE#) : set &UC4RB_RPM_FILE# = &url# :endif
:if &UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_VIA_HTTP# = "YES" : set &url# = str_cat("http://", &host#) : set &url# = str_cat(&url#, &UC4RB_RPM_FILE#) : set &UC4RB_RPM_FILE# = &url# :endif
export LC_ALL=C :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "\" output=`rpm 2>&1 &mode# &allfiles# &excludepath# &excludedocs# &replacefiles# &replacepkgs# &oldpackage# &ignoresize# \ &ignorearch# &ignoreos# &justdb# &nodigest# &nomanifest# &nosignature# &nodeps# &noorder# &noscripts# \ &nopre# &nopost# &nopreun# &nopostun# &notriggers# &notriggerin# &notriggerun# &notriggerpostun# &test# \ &ftpproxy# &ftpport# &httpproxy# &httpport# \ &UC4RB_RPM_FILE#`
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo "Package successfully installed." exit 0 fi
if echo "$output" | grep -q "package .* is already installed"; then : if &UC4RB_RPM_FAIL_IF_INSTALLED# = "YES" echo "Parameter 'Fail if installed' is set to 'yes' and the package with the same version is already installed." exit 3 : else echo "Package already installed." exit 0 : endif elif echo "$output" | grep -q "error: open of .* failed"; then echo "Authenticate failed with FTP/HTTP server when trying to download rpm package:" echo "$output" exit 1 elif echo "$output" | grep -q "error: Failed dependencies"; then echo "Install/upgrade not possible, because dependencies are not fulfilled." echo "$output" exit 2 else echo "Other failure during the install/upgrade process:" echo "$output" exit 4 fi
